title: DARIUS TROUBLES
body:
how the fuck do you sustain against darius,what champs counter him? 

i wasnt even engaging and with 50+ movespeed on him he could still catch me and nuke me,im fucken done playing againt the fucker, ill dodge a darius game anyday of the week.i hope he gets an urgot style nerf.

replies.body: If he starts up a Q early, you can walk towards him instead of away to get hit with the handle. If he is stupid enough to aa you a few times, he will take some damage from your minions as well as you if you turn on him while he is getting hit by minions. Of course it depends on machup though. Darius will always be a lane bully, just like Renekton. Both can be countered by staying away and praying that they don't freeze the lane so you cqn farm undor tower. Often times if I am playing a weak early game champion like Nasus or Tryndamere, I will take the Bounty mastery just to get some gold income while I am out of melee range.
